price: 56. Tokkel ken lakal yamaate marak ken taamáh innah tan taamá taamitah yan marak yookome mara ken abne digaalâ cakkisitiyyal. kaadu wadirsi maray ken lakal yamaate kas elle geya mara ken abne.

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
